code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[status,setStatus]=useState("loading");const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);const API_BASE="https://seven-stars-work.loca.lt";const fetchStatus=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/status"));setIsRunning(res.data.running);setStatus("ready");}catch(err){setStatus("error");}};const startBot=async()=>{setStatus("starting...");await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/start"));fetchStatus();};const stopBot=async()=>{setStatus("stopping...");await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/stop"));fetchStatus();};useEffect(()=>{fetchStatus();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC8 MT5 Trading Bot Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:isRunning?"üü¢ Running":"üî¥ Stopped"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:startBot,disabled:isRunning,children:"\u25B6\uFE0F Start Bot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:stopBot,disabled:!isRunning,children:"\u23F9 Stop Bot"})]}),status==="error"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:"\u26A0\uFE0F Cannot connect to backend (Flask not running?)"})]});}export default App;
